column1: Little Goat Diner////Not all that impressed by this place. The coffee and food was only okay. It was so loud you practically had to scream over breakfast
column2: the wait was also long even with a reservation - I can't imagine how long the people standing there without a reservation had being doing so. Also
column3: the restaurant is not as allergen friendly as it appears online or on yelp. Definitely not a gluten free or lactose free friendly establishment.
